text: Ndipo pakati pawo padzakhala chotchinga ndi chipupa mmene mudzakhala anthu amene adzazindikira wina aliyense poona zizindikiro zawo. Iwo adzaitana anthu a ku Paradiso: Mtendere ukhale pa inu. Koma panthawi imeneyo iwo adzakhala asadalowe ku Paradiso koma iwo adzakhala ndi chikhulupiriro choti adzalowanso mopanda chikaiko
